title: Audi's new China EV series won't have signature four-ring logo, sources say
description: Audi's new electric car series in China won't feature its iconic logo, focusing instead on brand image and local tech partnerships with SAIC and CATL, among others. A concept car is set to be revealed in November, with nine models planned by 2030. Audi has yet to confirm these details.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
